pullrequest.title: created script to manually post event to portal when FC docker image is built by an admin

content.raw:
@iche033 I've added these lines to avoid getting a Simulator's "Success" status in the UI after the simualtor was actually stopped.   At the same time, it seems reasonable to set the ready status back to Pending if there is no simulation running.

Do you agree with this change?
content.html:
@iche033 I've added these lines to avoid getting a Simulator's "Success" status in the UI after the simualtor was actually stopped. At the same time, it seems reasonable to set the ready status back to Pending if there is no simulation running.

Do you agree with this change?
